holidays.title: Mother's Day
holidays.description: Give Mom an extra hug and appreciate her for doing the toughest job on Earth.

holidays.title: National Buttermilk Biscuit Day
holidays.description: There’s nothing like a flaky, buttermilk biscuit paired with jam, honey, maple syrup, or butter.

holidays.title: Bond With Your Dog Day
holidays.description: How can you connect better with your dog? Discover this and more today.

holidays.title: Do Dah Day
holidays.description: Get your pets ready, we’re about to have a Do Dah Day parade!

holidays.title: International Chihuahua Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Let us celebrate International Chihuahua Appreciation Day in honor of the tiny breed of canines!

holidays.title: International Dylan Thomas Day
holidays.description: Join us as we commemorate the life and work of literary composer Dylan Thomas.

holidays.title: Mothers at the Wall Day
holidays.description: It's time to give your mother a warm hug to express gratitude for her unwavering love.

holidays.title: National Bruce Day
holidays.description: The popular boy's name, Bruce, is beloved by millions of people all across the world.

holidays.title: National Children's Day UK
holidays.description: Organize events and host National Children’s Day UK activities to show your support.

holidays.title: National Dance Like a Chicken Day
holidays.description: Let's relive fond memories of busting out the iconic Chicken Dance.

holidays.title: National Decency Day
holidays.description: National Decency Day is all about changing society by encouraging basic human decency.

holidays.title: National Om Day
holidays.description: Discover the origin of the rare and special, Buddism-inspired name ‘Om.’ Celebrate this special name today!

holidays.title: National Travel Insurance Claims Day
holidays.description: Travel insurance professionals ensure that we can travel without any fears and worries.

holidays.title: National Underground America Day
holidays.description: Yes, we don’t only have to live on top of the land.

holidays.title: National Veal Ban Action Day
holidays.description: Put down your forks. We’re fighting for animal rights this National Veal Ban Action Day.

holidays.title: Online Romance Day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate virtual love on this special Online Romance Day!

holidays.title: Paraguay Independence Day
holidays.description: Happy Independence Day to a country steeped in history, culture, and diversity!

holidays.title: Paraguay Independence Day
holidays.description: This Paraguay Independence Day, learn more about phenomenal Paraguay and her road to freedom.

holidays.title: Spinal Cord Injury Awareness Day
holidays.description: Let’s get ready to raise the profile of people with spinal cord injuries this May 14.

holidays.title: The Stars and Stripes Forever Day
holidays.description: Let’s get ready to sing ‘The Stars And Stripes Forever’ national march.

holidays.title: World Topiary Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate the shaped shrubs and switch the trend from everything cake to everything topiary.

holidays.title: Cate Blanchett’s Birthday
holidays.description: This siren of film’s breakthrough came in 1998 when she played the title role in "Elizabeth."

holidays.title: George Lucas’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let's get into what this wealthy director does, has done, and everything in between.

holidays.title: Miranda Cosgrove’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented actress and singer was the queen of children’s shows on Nickelodeon.

holidays.title: Pokimane’s Birthday
holidays.description: This content creator is so good at her job because she has fun with it.

holidays.title: Rob Gronkowski’s Birthday
holidays.description: He is flexible and fast like a wide receiver but big and strong like a lineman.
